00048 using namespace std;
00049 using namespace Hypertable;
00050 using namespace Hql;

00052 namespace {
00053 
00054   struct CommandCallback : HqlInterpreter::Callback {
00055     CommandInterpreter &commander;
00056     int command;
00057     boost::progress_display *progress;
00058     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00059 
00060     CommandCallback(CommandInterpreter &interp)
00061       : HqlInterpreter::Callback(interp.normal_mode()), commander(interp),
00062         command(0), progress(0) {
00063       format_ts_in_usecs = interp.timestamp_output_format()
00064           == CommandInterpreter::TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_USECS;
00065       output = stdout;
00066     }
00067 
00068     ~CommandCallback() {
00069       if (progress)
00070         delete progress;
00071 
00072       if (output && output != stdout)
00073         fclose(output);
00074     }
00075 
00076     virtual void on_parsed(ParserState &state) { command = state.command; }
00077 
00078     virtual void on_return(const String &str) { cout << str << endl; }
00079 
00080     virtual void on_update(size_t total) {
00081       if (!normal_mode)
00082         return;
00083 
00084       HT_ASSERT(command);
00085 
00086       if (command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA) {
00087         HT_ASSERT(!progress);
00088         cout <<"\nLoading "<< format_number(total)
00089              <<" bytes of input data..." << endl;
00090         progress = new boost::progress_display(total);
00091       }
00092     }
00093 
00094     virtual void on_progress(size_t amount) {
00095       HT_ASSERT(progress);
00096       *progress += amount;
00097     }
00098 
00099     virtual void on_finish(TableMutator *mutator) {
00100       Callback::on_finish(mutator);
00101       stopwatch.stop();
00102 
00103       if (normal_mode) {
00104         if (progress && progress->count() < file_size)
00105           *progress += file_size - progress->count();
00106 
00107         double elapsed = stopwatch.elapsed();
00108 
00109         if (command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA)
00110           fprintf(stderr, "Load complete.\n");
00111 
00112         fputc('\n', stderr);
00113         fprintf(stderr, "  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", elapsed);
00114 
00115         if (total_values_size)
00116           fprintf(stderr, "Avg value size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00117                  (double)total_values_size / total_cells);
00118 
00119         if (total_keys_size)
00120           fprintf(stderr, "  Avg key size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00121                  (double)total_keys_size / total_cells);
00122 
00123         if (total_keys_size && total_values_size) {
00124           fprintf(stderr, "    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s",
00125                  (total_keys_size + total_values_size) / elapsed);
00126 
00127           if (file_size)
00128             fprintf(stderr, " (%.2f bytes/s)", file_size / elapsed);
00129 
00130           fputc('\n', stderr);
00131         }
00132         if (total_cells) {
00133           fprintf(stderr, "   Total cells:  %llu\n", (Llu)total_cells);
00134           fprintf(stderr, "    Throughput:  %.2f cells/s\n",
00135                  total_cells / elapsed);
00136         }
00137         if (mutator)
00138           fprintf(stderr, "       Resends:  %llu\n",
00139                   (Llu)mutator->get_resend_count());
00140       }
00141     }
00142   };
00143 
00144 } // local namespace

00147 HqlCommandInterpreter::HqlCommandInterpreter(Client *client)
00148     : m_interp(new HqlInterpreter(client)) {
00149 }

00152 HqlCommandInterpreter::HqlCommandInterpreter(HqlInterpreter *interp)
00153     : m_interp(interp) {
00154 }

00157 void HqlCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00158   CommandCallback cb(*this);
00159   m_interp->execute(line, cb);
00160 }
